text:
e="preserve">Brigid Berlin (September 6, 1939 – July 17, 2020) was an American artist and Warhol superstar. She was born in New York City. She was known for working as an artistic model for Andy Warhol. She starred as herself in the 1966 Warhol movie "Chelsea Girls".
Berlin died of cardiac arrest from a pulmonary embolism in New York City on July 17, 2020 at the age of 80.
